ygData.subject: Re: So how bad are the changes for us?
ygData.msgSnippet: As stated by Verant : Enchanter s pets are affected by the same change as mage and necro pets, changing weapons will no longer decrease the attack delay.
ygData.messageBody:
As stated by Verant :

Enchanter's pets are affected by the same change as mage and necro pets,
changing weapons will no longer decrease the attack delay. Enchanters tend
to be a pretty quiet group, so I apologize for overlooking your mention in
the previous messages.

BLAH

----- Original Message -----
From: Freedom <sysgod@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, January 30, 2000 3:48 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] So how bad are the changes for us?


> From: Freedom <sysgod@...>
>
> Hi All
>
> just wondering if the recent pet changes have done anything
> subcritical to our class??
>
